word: But Satan came and insinuated doubts of God’s wisdom. . . . Eve fell under the temptation, and Adam accepted the forbidden fruit from his wife’s hand. He fell under the smallest test that the Lord could devise to prove his obedience, and the floodgates of woe were opened upon our world. . . . By one man’s disobedience many were made sinners.—Manuscript 20, 1898 (Manuscript Releases, vol. 8, pp. 39, 40).
